description: Extended benchmark for reasoning artifact lifecycle and Human-in-the-Reasoning checkpoints. 20 tasks across 4 categories, expanded from v1 (12 tasks) for improved statistical power.

tasks.prompt: Given a distributed tracing rollout plan, identify the top three instrumentation blind spots and rank mitigations by implementation effort and expected observability lift.
Compare three queue backpressure strategies under burst load and recommend one for a latency-sensitive payments pipeline.
Assess reliability implications of migrating a monolith service boundary into five microservices with mixed SLO targets.
Evaluate the tradeoffs between optimistic and pessimistic concurrency control for a real-time collaborative editing system with offline support.
Analyze the failure modes of a multi-region active-active database deployment and propose a consistency strategy that balances latency with data integrity guarantees.
Resolve conflicting internal memos on incident root cause where each memo blames a different subsystem and omits inconvenient evidence.
Evaluate a red-team claim that cache poisoning caused data drift while blue-team argues ETL schema mismatch.
You receive contradictory legal and product constraints for moderation policy. Propose a policy path with explicit uncertainty bounds.
Two engineering teams present opposing capacity plans for the same service. Team A projects linear growth; Team B cites exponential adoption. Reconcile the forecasts and identify hidden assumptions.
A security audit finds a vulnerability that the product team claims is mitigated by an existing control. The control documentation is ambiguous. Determine the true risk level and recommend actions.
Frame a decision memo for emergency rollback during a healthcare workflow outage affecting triage latency.
Design a mitigation plan for suspected fraud model drift while balancing customer impact and compliance obligations.
Recommend response priorities after a cloud region outage where internal teams disagree on immediate failover timing.
A machine learning model used for credit scoring shows demographic bias in a protected category. Draft a remediation plan that satisfies regulatory constraints while maintaining model performance.
Design an incident communication strategy for a data breach affecting customer PII, balancing transparency, legal exposure, and customer trust.
Synthesize an execution strategy from fragmented stakeholder notes that disagree on product scope and launch criteria.
Integrate qualitative user interviews and sparse telemetry into a defensible recommendation for onboarding redesign.
Construct a strategic narrative for multi-quarter platform investment with uncertain market and engineering constraints.
Given incomplete A/B test results with low statistical power and contradictory qualitative signals, recommend whether to ship, iterate, or kill the feature.
Propose a technical strategy for migrating a legacy system when the existing documentation is incomplete, the original engineers are unavailable, and the codebase has no tests.
